value.value:
@if(equals(activity('GET TGT HWM  SQL').output.firstRow.HighWaterMark,null),variables('brpExtractTo') ,
    formatDateTime(activity('GET TGT HWM  SQL').output.firstRow.HighWaterMark, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ'))
